<< fliplr Elementary functions floor >>

flipud

Flip order of elements up to dow

Syntax

B = flipud(A)

Input argument

A

an array

Output argument

B

flipped array.

Description

fliplr return an new array of A flipped up to down.

Example

x = eye(3, 2);
y = flipud(x)

See also

fliplr, flip, flipdim.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
